original_title: To Stride with Pride: A Human Rights Movement in Thailand
overview: A short film about about brave Thai people who are striving toward attaining civic equity and societal equality. This is in a country where social activism is largely forbidden and can be quite dangerous. With a blending of seriousness and light-heartedness, this film brings you to the lively streets of Chiang Mai, Thailand. There, you stride with pride in the 2020 Chiang Mai Pride Parade, with hundreds of others who are standing up for human rights.
title: To Stride with Pride: A Human Rights Movement in Thailand
